text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose

calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 29 in today's
episode I have an idiom for you to drop
a bombshell do you know what it means
well I am going to teach you how to drop
a bombshell on someone come let's find
out what this idiom means and how you
can drop a bombshell in your daily
conversation drop a bombshell or you can
say to drop a bombshell if you drop a
bombshell you announce some shocking or
disturbing news by dropping a bombshell
you announce something that changes a
situation drastically and unexpectedly
it basically means to make an unexpected
or shattering announcement in other
words to say something that was least
expected by anyone in short dropping a
bombshell means revealing sensationally
shocking surprising or amazing
information that disturbs everyone this
idiom is basically originated from the
destruction caused by a falling bomb and
came in use during the World War one
where the use of a bomb was made for the
first time all right now let's look at
some example sentences on how to drop a
bombshell in your daily conversation
example 1 the Indian Premier League
administration board dropped a bombshell
when they announced that they have sac
lylat Modi
example two our boss dropped a bombshell
today when he told us that our company
is going public and we're all getting a
thousand shares for a bonus example
three how did your girlfriend take it
when you dropped the bombshell about
breaking up with her example for the
Chairman dropped a bombshell when he
announced the merger with the company's
biggest rival example five but college
dropped a bombshell by denying admission
to the students who secured less than 75
percent marks in their final exams
